website_summaries.verdict: Provides good support with a really tight fit. Comfortable enough to wear throughout the day and night.
pros: With 80/20 mix of nylon and spandex, socks hold the ankle at the right angle while allowing freedom of movement
Owners report improved blood circulation in the feet
Helps to reduce heel pain for some people
cons: Some customers say it's difficult to put the socks on the feet initially until they stretch a bit

customer_reviews.title: I have plantar faciiitis and terrible pain in my heels
customer_reviews.text: These are miracle socks!! I have plantar faciiitis and terrible pain in my heels.... I have had two cortisone shots two months apart, been to 6 months of physical therapy and still having pain ....but the first time I put these socks on the pain went away....I could not believe it....I actually can walk in my shoes without pain. I will continue to wear these until my feet have had time to heal and probably even afterwards....Best $11 I've spent in a long time!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Totally worth trying.
customer_reviews.text: I have been wearing these almost every day for the last year on my left foot. I believe it has played a major role in curing my plantar fasciitis. My foot felt better almost immediately with the extra support and compression. After about two months there was 100 percent improvement. My foot is doing so much better now. I still continue to wear the comeni support sock regularly as my foot just needs the compression to prevent further irritation. I highly recommend giving these a try. I am a nurse and I definitely won’t work a shift without them.
customer_reviews.author: LauraLee

customer_reviews.title: Not better than the splint
customer_reviews.text: I bought it hoping it would help with my plantar fassciitis pain and the product didn't work. I am a size 9.5 in shoes and I got a medium but it was very small and left a mark on my leg where the sock ended. It didn't even hug my heel like I thought it would and didn't work as good as the splint did. Maybe it was because it was socks that were small but the splint actually helped me better than these socks
customer_reviews.author: Haley Smith

customer_reviews.title: Very good service. the XL size work for me very ...
customer_reviews.text: Be sure to order a larger size. I ordered 2 pairs of size M and found out too small on the ankle part. contacted the seller and received XL size a couple of days later. Very good service. the XL size work for me very well.
customer_reviews.author: Alison L.

customer_reviews.title: Obviously even though it does not provide support like a night splint
customer_reviews.text: I have planter fascistic and this was a less burdensome option that wearing a splint. Obviously even though it does not provide support like a night splint, it still does provide some. I wear it at night and feel they do help.
customer_reviews.author: Manish Sood

customer_reviews.title: Great for PF
customer_reviews.text: Great fit and feel. I wear these for PF with dress shoes at work and they help with the pain. Even better when I get home and slip on the tennis shoes, almost no pain at all! I wear a 9.5 shoe and got the large sock. They are snug, but not painfully so... just right.
customer_reviews.author: Bluff Gardener

customer_reviews.title: Helps to reduce foot pain and fatigue.
customer_reviews.text: Have 3 pairs of these and really do like them. Notice a huge improvement in my energy level and overall foot health. Pain is much less wearing these.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Parris

customer_reviews.title: Not quite what I was hoping for
customer_reviews.text: I had high expectations when ordering this product. I had acute Plantar Fasciitis, and was having trouble with a night splint. While the seller was excellent, the product didn't meet my expectations. I found the socks didn't seem to impact my pain level at all, and applying them felt nothing like the night splint they were supposed to replace. Still, excellent customer service, and the P.F. Still hurts.:(
customer_reviews.author: C. Haas

customer_reviews.title: These socks are very useful in my daily life
customer_reviews.text: These socks are very useful in my daily life. They provide ultimate comfort in my daily routine. They don't cover your whole foot which is good because you don't feel as much pressure as socks that cover your whole foot. These socks provided support for my muscle that usually ache when I walk with normal socks. These socks feels like it was created to stretch and prevent injuries or rashes.
customer_reviews.author: Emily chen

customer_reviews.title: Definitely helps with PF
customer_reviews.text: Is this better than a boot? No. It is good for travel when packing a bulky boot is not reasonable. My foot will slowly start to ache after a couple of days but it's much better than no support at all. Having the toes open allows me to wear comfy flip-flops as slippers in hotel rooms.
customer_reviews.author: Michael McKeeTop Contributor: Photography

customer_reviews.title: Not what I was expecting
customer_reviews.text: After reading The reviews for the socks I thought I would give them a try. I was expecting them to help with my plantar fasciitis but instead they cause my feet to swell which causes another pain. They help relieve some of the pain caused by the PF but not enough for me to but another pair. 😞
customer_reviews.author: Edna L. Prophater

customer_reviews.title: ITSELF APPEARS TO BE JUST FINE, HOWEVER
customer_reviews.text: THE PRODUCT, ITSELF, APPEARS TO BE JUST FINE, HOWEVER, THE SIZING IS UNDERSIZED. THE GOOD NEWS IS THAT THE COMPANY INITIATED AN OFFER TO REPLACE THE SOCKS AND THEIR CUSTOMER SERVICE HAS BEEN EXCELLENT. WITHOUT A DOUBT, WOULD PURCHASE AGAIN.
customer_reviews.author: Raymond C.

customer_reviews.title: Very tight on the leg
customer_reviews.text: I wear a size 10 women's. I ordered an XL because of some the reviews and it fit my foot great. Unfortunately for me, the top part is super tight on my leg and caused swelling around the top.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: These did not help at all and they made my ...
customer_reviews.text: These did not help at all and they made my foot fall asleep. I realize as compression socks, they are going to be tighter than regular socks, but these were extremely difficult to get on and off and then they didn't even help at all. Fail.
customer_reviews.author: Jones

customer_reviews.title: Helpful socks
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my husband and these are helping with easing his pain. Will buy a second pair.
customer_reviews.author: Colwell

customer_reviews.title: Top of sock too tight.
customer_reviews.text: Top of sock was too tight around the leg. It fit everywhere else and my measurements fit the size. They should put a measurement for the size of your leg it will fit. I could only wear it for a little while and had to take it off. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: D. Beaupre

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommended
customer_reviews.text: They seem to be really helping. I have worn these for only 4 nights but have already noticed a difference.
customer_reviews.author: Mpls reader

customer_reviews.title: These things are awesome! I felt relief the second that I put ...
customer_reviews.text: These things are awesome! I felt relief the second that I put them on for the first time. Been wearing them every day and still feel good and holding up well
customer_reviews.author: W. C.

customer_reviews.title: Didn't seem to get any relief from these. Tries ...
customer_reviews.text: Didn't seem to get any relief from these. Tries to wear to bed but my foot started to ache even more.
customer_reviews.author: Dan Aldous

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed...
customer_reviews.text: I was excited to receive this item as I have PF. However, the product came in a not so appealing package. I ordered a small but it doesn't fit at all. feels like it was made for a child. Bummer. I'm thinking of returning it.
customer_reviews.author: pinkiespots

customer_reviews.title: I make sure I put on the socks and it feels much better quickly. It hasn't cured the problem but I ...
customer_reviews.text: These have been really helpful. When I feel the pain in my heel returning, I make sure I put on the socks and it feels much better quickly. It hasn't cured the problem but I don't wear them all the time so it may be my own fault.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: These socks were very uncomfortable. The tops were so ...
customer_reviews.text: These socks were very uncomfortable. The tops were so tight on my lower legs I could not wear them longer than an hour as they were cutting into my legs.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: These seem like they would be great but I think I ordered ...
customer_reviews.text: These seem like they would be great but I think I ordered the wrong size as they were very snug and almost hurt. If in doubt I would go a size up.
customer_reviews.author: Jenna

customer_reviews.title: Better, for me
customer_reviews.text: Tricky to get on, or off, that's why they work. Open toes a must no pain. Better, for me, to not wear longer than 6 hours
customer_reviews.author: Richard Norton

customer_reviews.title: Too tight
customer_reviews.text: I couldn't put these socks on my feet to save my life. It was so hard to put on. I never wore them and it is too late to return them now.
customer_reviews.author: bobson

customer_reviews.title: Not for me
customer_reviews.text: Arrived as promised. Didn’t help the pain after wearing them for a week
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and good support
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable! Wasn't too tight and gives great support to the feet!
customer_reviews.author: Nan

customer_reviews.title: no more foot problems!
customer_reviews.text: my plantar fasciitis is gone... need i say more! They work.
customer_reviews.author: Pepsi nuthead1

customer_reviews.title: My husband loves these socks. I haven't heard him ...
customer_reviews.text: My husband loves these socks. I haven't heard him complain about pain since he has had them. I'm actually ordering another pair.
customer_reviews.author: Shara

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: Didn't help my Fasciiitis at all, getting surgery in a couple months, I'm sick of the pain.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I am very happy with this product
customer_reviews.text: These have significantly helped my plantar fasciitis during the day! I wear them under my socks at work and they helped keep my feet stretched during the day. I will order another pair to switch out. I am very happy with this product. They don't stretch either, I was afraid they'd get loose after wearing.
customer_reviews.author: Angela Alanis  Norman

customer_reviews.title: This works !
customer_reviews.text: Helped my wife so much . She recieves a lot of comfort !
customer_reviews.author: Big Jim

customer_reviews.title: Very good quality and very comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I wear this when I running. It helps. Very good quality and very comfortable!
customer_reviews.author: Tracy

customer_reviews.title: They work!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent quality! They have allowed me to be able to run again!
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Excellent quality, very tight fit, I am happy that I ordered one size larger
customer_reviews.author: CS

customer_reviews.title: Great Support
customer_reviews.text: I'm a dancer, and these really help support my ankles when I'm dancing. They run a little small.
customer_reviews.author: Denis Adair

customer_reviews.title: Work well but smaller than expected. While they work ...
customer_reviews.text: Work well but smaller than expected. While they work well on my heels. they fit too tight around the ankles
customer_reviews.author: Greta Garbo Bryant

customer_reviews.title: Correct size was difficult to determine.
customer_reviews.text: I just had a size problem. They were way too tight. I don't like to return things in the mail because it's not convenient.
customer_reviews.author: Teresa F Hill

customer_reviews.title: He very like wear it
customer_reviews.text: I bought this sock to my sun.He very like wear it.When he played with ball,or run,walk.It was very comfortable .And the sock was the cotton,it was easy to clean.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: TO TIGHT
customer_reviews.text: To tight, could not get these on my feet, and I purchased x large!! UPDATE: I purchased some shoes at ORTHOFEET.COM , and wearing them, has finally cured my Plantar Fasciitis!! No kidding, after wasting money on every gimmick out there to help my foot pain, I got these shoes and BOOM, I could walk pain free! Better than taping, nightboots, splints , rollers....etc. I wear my shoes from the time I wake up to the time I go to bed. Bought a pair for in the house and a pair for going out. I still do foot stretches, but no longer have the horrible heal pain.﻿
customer_reviews.author: Simnut

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: These were TOO tight! They made my feet pulsate. :(
customer_reviews.author: Naz

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: They work OK. But they get really hot at night.
customer_reviews.author: FSCDEBATE

customer_reviews.title: runs small
customer_reviews.text: order a size larger than what you wear..run very small...
customer_reviews.author: Teejay

customer_reviews.title: Granddaughter loved it
customer_reviews.text: Granddaughter loves the way they feel. Will be buying more.
customer_reviews.author: Sylvia G.

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Runs a bit small. I would have ordered next size up.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: These socks are amazing. I have plantar issues and these helped more than the night splints did!!
customer_reviews.author: Southern Girl

customer_reviews.title: Great stuff
customer_reviews.text: I felt better after first use, previous after did sport, I felt some pain in the ankle.
customer_reviews.author: gang chen

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Really helped me, sometimes I also put them on after work in place of my daily compression sock.
customer_reviews.author: Patty

customer_reviews.title: I did not expect this pair of socks work good at beginning
customer_reviews.text: I bought this socks for my husband who has varicose vein. I did not expect this pair of socks work good at beginning. After wearing several times, my husband told me this socks work great. He said the socks hold tight, which increased the blood circulation and made his feet comfortable and reduced his pain. He told me go buy another one
customer_reviews.author: Abby

customer_reviews.title: Ouch, ouch
customer_reviews.text: I have plantar Fasciitis and love to walk barefooted on the carpet, which is a NO NO..with these socks , i have been able to walk w/o any after discomfort.. But best to use with slippers and or shoes. GOOD product..have to stretch a bit to apply
customer_reviews.author: John A. Ramos

customer_reviews.title: Hard to get on but good compression without being too tight
customer_reviews.text: Difficult to get on my foot but once achieved the compression is comfortable. I wear a women's 9.5W and ordered the medium as per the size chart. My guess is a size up would be easier to get on but might not have enough compression.
customer_reviews.author: Bookworm

customer_reviews.title: Low compression & runs big
customer_reviews.text: Returning this product. The quality of the dock feels good. However, the compression is far from strong. The sock runs big (length wise), covering too much of the toes. I ordered a medium (7-7.5 in womens) after referring to the size chart, but should've have gone with a small which would've better length for my foot. The compression may have been improved in a smaller sock as well! Treat My Feet is s far better product! Try ZATECH a slight compression and support for walking and running.
customer_reviews.author: favor

customer_reviews.title: Nice!
customer_reviews.text: These ankle socks are perfect for anyone on their feet for extended periods of time. These socks are high quality and perfect for tired feet. They fit just as expected and feel wonderful. Super comfortable and make my feet hurt less after being on them for long periods of time.
customer_reviews.author: (*´/▽`*)/Ōkami-chan

customer_reviews.title: Save your time and $$$ — Buy Elsewhere
customer_reviews.text: The compression in this sock, which fit properly, is uneven and less than what is in a pair of ordinary trouser socks. I don't see any way how it might be helpful for plantar fasciitis. I can't recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Alegria

customer_reviews.title: Oversized people
customer_reviews.text: Seems to be all made Unfortunately it for Small people not for Oversized people
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: suitable for those who love sports, wear comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Coarse and thick, strong and wearable, suitable for those who love sports, wear comfortable, can protect good feet, socks than ordinary moisture absorption and perspiration good
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: These alleviate pain!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Ordered these for my daughter who is having lots of pain on heels.She is very pleased with them. Well worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Grammy

customer_reviews.title: Good quality-price ratio
customer_reviews.text: Fit well, tight but comfortable, a good choice for the better quality-price ratio, compared with the others I purchased before.
customer_reviews.author: David

product_meta.title: COMENII Plantar Fasciitis Socks Better Than Night Splint for Men & Women, Compression Foot Sleeves Increase Circulation, Ankle/Heel Brace Arch Support Relieve Pain Fast and Ease Swelling
feature_bullets: ★ an ideal foot compression sleeves for preventing and alleviating pain associated with plantar fasciitis.
★ 80% nylon + 20% spandex stretch holds foot & ankle at correct angle with just the right level of healing compression, it fits, but is not super tight.
★ wearing compression socks for all except shower time, you can wear it for extensive walking together with your orthotics and it makes a huge difference.
★ more helpful than orthotics when you work with barefoot, certain sandals, pilates, yoga. This foot sleeve can relieve your pf-essential oils, yoga toes, stretches, tai chi etc.
★ 100% money back guarantee: if you do not like this compression sleeve for any reason, just let us know, we will give you a free replacement or refund you the full price*no questions asked*
